content.query:
USE olist_synapse
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessOrderView
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @Statement VARCHAR(MAX)
SET @Statement = 
'
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW olistOrders AS
SELECT 
    * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''processing/orders.parquet/*.parquet'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''OlistDataLake'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
        ) AS ord;
'

PRINT @Statement

EXEC (@Statement)

END
GO

EXEC CreateSQLServerlessOrderView

SELECT * FROM olistOrders
